text: Johann Niklaus Schneider-Ammann (born 18 February 1952) is a Swiss businessman and politician. He is a member of the Free Democratic Party. He was the President of the Swiss Confederation from 1 January 2016 until 31 December 2016. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1952 births Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:Swiss businesspeople Category:Living people Category:Emmental (administrative district) Category:People from the canton of Bern
title: Johann Schneider-Ammann
